name: Elasticsearch
author: dominic@stilma.net

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Elasticsearch Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## Install Requirements

apt update
apt install -y jq ca-certificates gnupg2 wget tar curl

cd /mnt/server

## Install Elasticsearch
wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-7.13.4-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
tar -xzf elasticsearch-7.13.4-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
mv elasticsearch-7.13.4/* .
rm elasticsearch-7.13.4-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
rm -R elasticsearch-7.13.4

## Finish command
echo "All done! Just start it up :)"

variables.name: Discovery Seed Hosts
variables.description: Please keep default if you are unsure.
